desc: Love to workout? Don't let period or incontinence issues stop you. Flow 2 Freedom has designed a collection of leakproof / period proof apparel that fits your lifestyle. Free shipping In the United States.

layout.text: "What a game changer for women in sport. These leggings are revolutionizing the landscape and breaking down barriers for all girls and women out there"- Georgie B. - Founder of Fitrwoman App - ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
